title: Client stopped working when trying to load into game HELP!
body: Hey whenever i try to load into a game my client stops working and gives me what looks like an error that says League of Legends (TM) Client has stopped working. It's not a bugsplat that's for sure. This occurs no matter what type of game even if its a custom. It used to be where i would have to restart my computer and then it would work then it was i had to shut down my computer then itll work but now no matter how many times i shut it down it doesn't work. Now i have a pbe account set up so i tried using that and it works perfectly like this problem doesnt's exist. I really need help so please help if you can. i tried uninstall then reinstall but it didn't work idk what to do i also disabled my IP HELPER so it's not that. any sollutions? Again please help idk what to do.
